attributes.action: a) grant the unconditional right to family reunion to everyone who wins the right to stay in the UK (whether under the refugee convention, humanitarian protection, human rights act, legacy process or other grounds) b) grant children the right to join their mother or father even if they turned 18 before their parents’ asylum claim was settled.
